name: Forward-Elite-V3
description: Professional Telegram Forwarding Bot with 1->5 Multi-Target, Auto-Resume, and Keyword Mapping.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Log Channel ID (with -100) to receive bot logs.

AUTO_BACKUP_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID where all forwarded files will be backed up (Hidden).

THUMB_LIMIT.description: Max files limit when thumbnail is used (Set higher for VPS).

FORCE_SUB_CHANNELS.description: Multiple Channel IDs for Force Sub (Space separated, e.g. -100123 -100456).

FORCE_SUB_ON.description: Set to 'True' to enable force sub, otherwise 'False'.
